title: Screening π-Extended Ruthenium(II) Complexes for the Photoinduced Oxidative Modulation of Amyloid-β Peptide Aggregation.
abstract: Controlling the aggregation of amyloid-β (Aβ) peptides offers a promising strategy to mitigate Alzheimer's disease (AD). Herein, we introduce a series of photoactivatable Ru(II) complexes (
